name: Storm's Eye
help: Delivers An Attack With A Potency Of 100.  Combo Action: Maim  Combo Potency: 270  Combo Bonus: Decreases Target's Slashing Resistance By 10% And HP Recovery Via Healing Magic By 20%  Duration: 20s  Combo Bonus Cannot Be Stacked With The Dancing Edge Status. Grants Wrath When Used With Defiance.  Duration: 30s Grants Abandon When Used With Deliverance  Duration: 30s
json: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.  Combo Action: Maim  Combo Potency: 270  Combo Bonus: Decreases target's slashing resistance by 10% and HP recovery via healing magic by 20%  Duration: 20s  Combo bonus cannot be stacked with the Dancing Edge status.

yes.yes: Grants Wrath when used with Defiance.  Duration: 30s
Grants Abandon when used with Deliverance  Duration: 30s
